Bullet: Built an ATS resume generation system using Vertex AI (Gemini) via LiteLLM that extracts job description signals, generates ATS bullets with 190–220 character validation and auto-repair loops, then compiles LaTeX into a final PDF (CLI + UI).

Built a Gmail-connected email intelligence app using AWS Bedrock with instructor and Pydantic schemas to classify threads and generate structured summaries; added RAG with Titan embeddings and FAISS retrieval plus incremental processing.

Topic: Columbia University - Credit-Risk Modeling (Kalamata Capital Group, 2025)
Bullet: Built credit-risk models (XGBoost, CatBoost, regularized logistic regression) on 100K transactions with 200 engineered features, using TimeSeriesSplit cross-validation, and SHAP interpretability; achieved 0.82 AUC, accelerating underwriting decisions.
Utilized Cursor for AI-assisted code generation and refactoring of the data pipeline, increasing velocity.

Topic: Chulalongkorn University - Algorithmic FX Trading Strategy (2023)
Bullet: Designed an end-to-end FX trading pipeline with feature engineering (technical indicators, signals) and optimized ML classifiers (Random Forest, XGBoost) to predict profitable trade entries under risk–reward strategies, achieving 5.8% simulated net profit.

Launched an LLM-based conversational recommender in LangChain using GPT-3.5/FLAN-T5 for query understanding and response generation and Weaviate vector search for retrieval, achieving >70% single-turn accuracy with multi-turn support.
